resources.string: Which food does NOT contain Vitamin D?
_______ lowers levels of stress hormones and strengthens the immune system.
Like a fingerprint, every person has a unique ________ print.
When you sneeze, all of your bodily functions stop, even your heart.
The _________ lobe is the area of the brain that allows humans to hear and understand people speaking.
Yoga has a lot of surprising health benefits. Which of the following is NOT one of them?
Your body uses ________ muscles to balance itself while standing still.
It takes 17 muscles to smile and 43 to frown.
